<S%H2088>"This<s%> is the <S%H2708>statute<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1696>'Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that they <S%H3947>bring<s%> you an <S%H8549>unblemished<s%> <S%H122>red<s%> <S%H6499>heifer<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H9249>defect,<s%> [and] on <S%H834>which<s%> a <S%H5923>yoke<s%> has <S%H3808>never<s%> been <S%H5927>placed.<s%>

'And you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> it to <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and it shall be <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H413>outside<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> and be <S%H7819>slaughtered<s%> in his <S%H6440>presence.<s%>

'Next <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of its <S%H1818>blood<s%> with his <S%H676>finger,<s%> and <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of its <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times.<s%>

'Then the <S%H6499>heifer<s%> shall be <S%H8313>burned<s%> in his <S%H5869>sight;<s%> its <S%H5785>hide<s%> and its <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and its <S%H1818>blood,<s%> with its <S%H6569>refuse,<s%> shall be <S%H8313>burned.<s%>

'And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H231>hyssop<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> [material,] and <S%H7993>cast<s%> it into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H8316>burning<s%> <S%H6499>heifer.<s%>

'The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall then <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>body<s%> in water, and <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> but the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

'The one who <S%H8313>burns<s%> it shall also <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>body<s%> in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

'Now a <S%H376>man<s%> who is <S%H2889>clean<s%> shall <S%H622>gather<s%> up the <S%H665>ashes<s%> of the <S%H6499>heifer<s%> and <S%H5117>deposit<s%> them <S%H4480>outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> in a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> and the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H4931>keep<s%> it as <S%H4325>water<s%> to remove <S%H5079>impurity;<s%> it is <S%H9128>purification<s%> from <S%H9128>sin.<s%>

'And the one who <S%H622>gathers<s%> the <S%H665>ashes<s%> of the <S%H6499>heifer<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening;<s%> and it shall be a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2708>statute<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and to the <S%H1616>alien<s%> who <S%H1481>sojourns<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them.
'The one who <S%H5060>touches<s%> the <S%H4191>corpse<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H120><s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

'That <S%H1931>one<s%> shall <S%H2398>purify<s%> himself from <S%H2398>uncleanness<s%> with the water on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> and on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> [and then] he shall be <S%H2891>clean;<s%> but <S%H518>if<s%> he does not <S%H2398>purify<s%> himself on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> and on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> he shall not be <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

<S%H3605>'Anyone<s%> who <S%H5060>touches<s%> a <S%H4191>corpse,<s%> the <S%H5315>body<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> has <S%H4191>died,<s%> and does not <S%H2398>purify<s%> himself, <S%H2930>defiles<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> and that <S%H5315>person<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> for <S%H5079>impurity<s%> was not <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> on him, he shall be <S%H2931>unclean;<s%> his <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> is <S%H5750>still<s%> on him.

<S%H2088>'This<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H4191>dies<s%> in a <S%H168>tent:<s%> <S%H3605>everyone<s%> who <S%H935>comes<s%> into the <S%H168>tent<s%> and <S%H3605>everyone<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is in the <S%H168>tent<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

'And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H3627>vessel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H369>has<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H9489>covering<s%> <S%H6616>tied<s%> <S%H6616>down<s%> on it, shall be <S%H2931>unclean.<s%>

'Also, <S%H3605>anyone<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> in the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> <S%H2491>one<s%> <S%H2491>who<s%> has been <S%H2491>slain<s%> with a <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> who has <S%H4191>died<s%> [naturally,] <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H120>human<s%> <S%H6106>bone<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H6913>grave,<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

'Then for the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> [person] they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H6083>ashes<s%> of the <S%H8316>burnt<s%> <S%H9128>purification<s%> from <S%H9128>sin<s%> and <S%H2416>flowing<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> shall be <S%H5414>added<s%> to them in a <S%H3627>vessel.<s%>

'And a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H376>person<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H231>hyssop<s%> and <S%H2881>dip<s%> [it] in the <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> [it] on the <S%H168>tent<s%> and on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>furnishings<s%> and on the <S%H5315>persons<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were <S%H8033>there,<s%> and on the one who <S%H5060>touched<s%> the <S%H6106>bone<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> the <S%H2491>one<s%> <S%H2491>slain<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> the one <S%H4191>dying<s%> [naturally] <S%H176>or<s%> the <S%H6913>grave.<s%>

'Then the <S%H2889>clean<s%> [person] shall <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> on the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> and on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> and on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he shall <S%H2398>purify<s%> him from <S%H2398>uncleanness,<s%> and he shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> [himself] in <S%H4325>water<s%> and shall be <S%H2891>clean<s%> by <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

'But the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is <S%H2930>unclean<s%> and does not <S%H2398>purify<s%> himself from <S%H2398>uncleanness,<s%> that <S%H5315>person<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he has <S%H2930>defiled<s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> for <S%H5079>impurity<s%> has not been <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> on him, he is <S%H2931>unclean.<s%>

'So it shall be a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2708>statute<s%> for them. And he who <S%H5137>sprinkles<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> for <S%H5079>impurity<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and he who <S%H5060>touches<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> for <S%H5079>impurity<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening.<s%>
